pinyin: shùn biàn shuō yī xià wǒ wàng le

english: by the way you look great
chinese: 顺便说一下你看起来很好
pinyin: shùn biàn shuō yī xià nǐ kàn qǐ lái hěn hǎo
kuài diǎn wǒ men zǒu ba
wǒ men qù zěn me yàng
bù kě néng shì zhēn de
spanish: de ninguna manera eso es verdad

pinyin: wǒ de cuò wǒ wàng le
wǒ xiàng wǎng cháng yī yàng chí dào le
zhì shǎo wǒ men shì guò le
dào mù qián wéi zhǐ hái bù cuò

chinese: 到目前为止什么都没有
pinyin: dào mù qián wéi zhǐ shén me dōu méi yǒu
